text: Paul Nguyěn Van Hoá (20 July 1931 - 14 February 2017) was a Vietnamese Roman Catholic bishop. Nguyên Van Hòa became a priest in 1959. He served as of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Nha Trang from 1975 to 2009. ==References== category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Vietnamese Roman Catholic bishops
title: Paul Nguyên Van Hòa
